## Simple Linear Regression 

Some sample data:
```
set.seed(42)
data <- data.frame(y = c(rnorm(10,2), rnorm(10,1),rnorm(10,0)),
                x = rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each = 10))
head(data)
```

The mean of each group:
```
(group.means = tapply(data$y, data$x, mean))
```
The grand mean:
```
mean(group.means)
```
To specify reference coding: 
```
lm(a ~ b, x, contrasts = list(b = contr.sum))
```
Note that the parameter estimates reflect differences from the grand mean.
